name: recording-webvr
description: Record VR experiences and replay them later

scripts.dist: npm run build && npm run minify && npm run buildBookmarklet && npm run minifyBookmarklet
scripts.build: cat src/players/webvr*.js src/{players,recorders}/threex.json* src/{players,recorders}/threex.{webvr,gamepad}* src/*.js vendor/download.js simple-upload.js/src/client.js > build/recording-webvr.js
scripts.watchBookmarklet: watch 'npm run build; npm run buildBookmarklet' src/ --interval=0.1
